name: Baby Bottle Bullrush!
description:
BABY BOTTLE BULLRUSH!

by JustinRichardsMusic

DISCLAIMER:

You may see a black screen for a while, this can happen the first time you play the game while the assets download... sit tight :-)

PREMISE:

You are a mere “beginner” programmer in the present day and have discovered that your favourite coding YouTuber Javidx9 has suddenly ceased making loads of really helpful useful content!

Whilst investigating this you discover a mysterious “mystical object” which you can use to transport yourself to a horrifying place (the future) where really practical and useful coding videos no longer exist and a seemingly never-ending army of really cute babies (javidx10’s) have over run the programming world!

Perhaps you can use your skills as a newbie programmer to track down the cause of this apocalyptic future world and stop it before it’s too late!

Or perhaps you can help feed crying babies instead? Either way, the coding world needs you!

PRESENT DAY WORLD:

Explore the world, find a mysterious mystical object to progress.

Use the “mystical object” to transport between the present day world and the “code-apocalyptic” future world. Isolated “teleport zones” will be marked with an X.

Return to the present day world in a different location than you left allowing you to transgress areas that would otherwise be blocked.

Eventually find yourself at Javidx9's house on a secluded island (I assume...) so you can put an end to this video content hiatus once and for all!

FUTURE WORLD:

The future is bleak... no coding videos to be found any where and Javidx10 has some how managed to clone an army of themselve and guess what?  They're HUNGRY... very hungry!

Collect milk bottles whilst you try to run away from / avoid a seemingly endless army of Javidx10 clones.

When your milk supplies are sufficient you can feed the clones so they will stop chasing you.

Don't forget to collect the mysterious object you "dropped" on your way in, as well as any keys you might find lying around to unlock new areas in the present day world.

GOOD LUCK!
